title: Professor Proton
description: Get your goggles, put your labcoat on, here he comes, Professor Proton! Episodes include the classic series with Arthur Jeffries and the reboot with Wil Wheaton.
quote: Why can you not trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
altHero: Wil Wheaton in a lab coat on a science lab set
alt1: Arthur Jeffries as Professor Proton in his lab
alt3: Wheaton welcomes astronaut Howard Wolowitz on the show
alt4: Wheaton talks with Dr. Amy Farrah Fowler who is pointing at a model brain
